Description.Text: A short walk from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees, the Hotel Mayflower welcomes guests to one of the most prestigious areas of Paris, close to both the business and fashion districts. Discover the warmth and inviting nature of this typically Parisian hotel, and indulge in the cosy atmosphere of its peaceful and simple surroundings. In this pleasant hotel, where elegance is combined with tradition, guests will find 24 rooms all with air-conditioning and double-glazing and equipped with everything they will need to make their stay a comfortable one. Breakfast is included and served in the breakfast room: tea, coffee, hot chocolate, pastries, buns, a selection of jams, cheese, cereal and yoghurtâ¦Everything one would need to kick start the day. The location of the hotel is ideal for exploring the different attractions Paris has to offer. The hotel is also central to all types of amenities, making getting round the "city of lights" easier for guests. To find information or to consult your emails, WI-FI connection is available at the hotel. To make the client's experience more complete, the friendly team is on hand to welcome them and ensure that everything runs smoothly for them throughout their entire stay.
